sub_title:
Learning and Development Leader in the Energy Business |  People Centric Leader | 
30 years of Industry experience with Shell
summary:
People describe me as a team leader that is passionate about development and coaching of others. Known for championing new ideas, energising teams with infectious enthusiasm and seeking excellence in delivery by creating a culture of collaboration, integrity, honesty and care. 
I have held Technical, Leadership and Learning/Training roles within Shell
•	I have obtained exposures in a variety of Cultural settings in Netherlands, Oman, UK, Malaysia, Russia & Norway with demonstrated his ability to build strong productive relationships with government and industry peers.
•	Technical exposures to a wide range of field development contexts: Oil, Gas, Carbon Capture & Storage Over all Stages of the asset lifecycle; Business Development, Exploration, Project Maturation, Execution, Operations, Well and Reservoir Management as well as Technology development and deployment
•	I have led multi-disciplinary teams and communities of ~300 people. Personal mentor to many talented individuals 
•	I have delivered training classes to project professionals on leadership styles and behaviour as well as stakeholder engagement, Influencing and quality decision making skills
